data.message: When will u people release dislike button????

replies.message: Hey Gohil. We are currently looking into options to provide a range of ways for people to express themselves and are hoping to test something soon. Stay tuned! -Kate
My name is Heman.. Gohil is my surname... Help me out to change my name... I can't change it.
Hey Heman. You can find more information on how to change your name here: http://on.fb.me/1LwYy17. Hope this helps! -Kristin
Nothing is working..  I'm trying since two years...
Hey Heman. Please send us a private message with more information about this issue so we can further assist you. Thanks in advance! -Kate

Facebook I have a problem - I can no longer reply to a comment or filter comments (newest / most relevant etc.) at posts. This problem started only a few hours ago. Is this some sort of testing or is it permanent? My friends have the same problem. These features are still working with old posts (posted before 6+ hours), but when it comes to new postst, the features are no longer available. There is a screenshot with marked missing features - http://imgur.com/5WQ3Mdd Thank you :)
You people never reply on private messages... #kateFacebook
